author: olamy
msg: Added the RemoteIpValve to the Tomcat configuration, if enabled by a property configurable in the pom.xml. By default the valve is enabled.

author: breser
msg: On svn-auth-x509 branch, deal with character encodings (mostly).
This still doesn't properly handle T61String/TeletexString, largely because
I don't quite have it done and the encoding is a mess.
(cert_tests): Add certs with UTF-8, UniversalString, BMPString and T61String
encoded strings.  The T61 cert is disabled for now.
